name: Five Years After
description:
A 2D top-down zombie survival game in which you try to survive an onslaught of zombies. Collect ammo and health randomly placed on the map in order to survive. Shoot your way through, or get the tank and blow your way free. But keep in mind, the tank will draw the attention of an even bigger obstacle - the military!

After the apocalypse - there was only one goal left - survive!
